title: The Sky is Everywhere movie debuts today on Apple TV+
content:
For Valentines Day weekend, the YA novel by Jandy Nelson, this is the latest film hailing from Apple’s partnership with A24. It is directed by Josephine Decker.

description: For Valentines Day weekend, Apple TV+ today premieres The Sky is Everywhere. Based on the YA novel by Jandy Nelson, this is the latest film hailing from Apple’s partnership with A24.
